SILVER - Individual Market Analysis

CoT signals and diagnostics for Silver futures.

As of 2025-10-21

Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • Silver futures currently show extreme speculative short positioning.
  • Speculators are net long 10.16% while hedgers are net short -13.87% (2025-10-21, balanced view).
  • The market has seen a strong negative 4-week flow of -12.22% recently.
  • The most extreme positioning is in Silver, with hedgers extremely long.

Technical Summary:

  • Speculative net positioning is at an extreme short level (z-score -2.80).
  • Hedger net positioning is at an extreme long level (z-score 2.69).
  • The market is flagged as crowded short, indicating "Crowded_Short_Risk_ShortCover."
  • Current 4-week flow is negative (-9.60%), but hedger flow shows acceleration.
  • A reversal score of 3 highlights significant tactical reversal potential.

References:

  • Silver_CoT_Signals: Latest update 2025-10-21.
  • Key influencing datapoints: Spec_zscore, Hedger_zscore, Flow_4w, and reversal_score.
  • Public datasets to improve analysis: Daily spot/futures prices for real-time context.
  • Public datasets to improve analysis: Trading volume data for liquidity insights.
